caption.p: Genomic diversity of SARSCoV-2 in the USA, UK, Iceland and China. Strains collected from all four countries are highlighted on the global phylogenetic tree. a) Strains collected in the USA shown in purple. b) Strains from the UK shown in red. c) Strains collected in Iceland shown in red. d) Strains collected in China shown in green. Regional colours match to the global phylogeny shown in Fig. 1c. (For interpretation of the references to colour in this figure legend, the reader is referred to the web version of this article.)
